data.name: Hentai Tentacle Survivors
data.detailed_description:
Hentai Tentacle Survivors is a top down action shooter where you defend against waves of horny enemies attacking you from all sides. You'll need quick reflexes and a steady hand to survive. Tentacles have no mercy, and they won't stop until they've had their way with you. Good luck!

You play as Alyssa, an experienced special forces operative. You've been sent on a mission to a remote research facility to investigate strange activity. Upon arrival, you find that the place has been overrun by horny tentacle creatures. Your mission is to find out what happened and put a stop to these creatures before they can escape and spread their tentacles all over the world.

Features:

- Precise, top-down shooting action
- Intuitive controls
- Gorgeous pixel art
- Retro sound effects and music
- Endless mode for infinite replayability

Every enemy is ready to ravage you. Take them down before they can get their slimy tentacles on you. As an experience fighter your reflexes are sharp, and your pelvic muscles are strong. Let's see if you can survive this slippery onslaught.

Gameplay:

- Use [WASD] or [arrow] keys to move
- Use [MouseLeft] to shoot
- Use [R] to reload
- Every level is procedurally generated. There are endless possibilities!
- Tentacles are slippery and they won't hesitate so slide under your armor.
- This is a standard top-down shooter game. The goal is to survive as long as possible and get the highest score.

You'll need quick reflexes and a steady hand to survive. Tentacles have no mercy, and they won't stop until they've had their way with you. Good luck!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity. Also contains lots of blood when enemies are killed.
